test_scenarios.name: P0: Search for a One-Way Flight and Proceed to Passenger Details
steps: Enter a valid origin and destination for a one-way flight.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully navigated to the passenger details page with flight information pre-populated.

test_scenarios.name: P0: Retrieve a Booking using Booking Reference and Last Name
steps: Enter the last name associated with the booking.
